entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High 12 except 6 along exposed areas of the coast.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 12 except 6 along exposed areas of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 30 April 2023
